title: Dark Horse (feat. Juicy J)
author: Katy Perry
lyrics:
[00:00.10] (Oh, no)
[00:05.17] Yeah, y'all know what it is
[00:08.38] Katy Perry, Juicy J, uh huh
[00:14.41] Let's rage
[00:15.37] I knew you were
[00:17.00] You were gonna come to me
[00:18.85] And here you are
[00:20.54] But you better choose carefully
[00:22.45] 'Cause I, I'm capable of anything
[00:26.67] Of anything and everything
[00:29.77] Make me your Aphrodite
[00:33.54] Make me your one and only
[00:36.77] But don't make me your enemy (enemy)
[00:41.47] Your enemy (your enemy), your enemy
[00:45.18] So you wanna play with magic?
[00:48.83] Boy, you should know what you falling for
[00:52.43] Baby, do you dare to do this?
[00:56.08] 'Cause I'm coming at you like a dark horse
[01:00.16] Are you ready for, ready for
[01:04.12] A perfect storm, a perfect storm?
[01:07.77] 'Cause once you're mine, once you're mine
[01:12.12] There's no going back
[01:15.41] 
[01:20.77] Mark my words
[01:22.50] This love will make you levitate
[01:24.37] Like a bird, like a bird without a cage
[01:28.03] But down to earth
[01:29.76] If you choose to walk away, don't walk away
[01:34.86] It's in the palm of your hand now, baby
[01:38.41] It's a yes or a no, no maybe
[01:42.29] So just be sure before you give it up to me
[01:46.93] Up to me, give it up to me
[01:50.52] So you wanna play with magic?
[01:54.37] Boy, you should know what you falling for
[01:57.92] Baby, do you dare to do this?
[02:01.63] 'Cause I'm coming at you like a dark horse
[02:05.64] Are you ready for, ready for
[02:09.63] A perfect storm, a perfect storm?
[02:13.19] 'Cause once you're mine, once you're mine
[02:15.69] (Yo, dreaming!) There's no going back
[02:19.19] Uh, she's a beast (beast), I call her Karma (come back)
[02:23.16] She eat your heart out like Jeffrey Dahmer (whoo!)
[02:26.96] Be careful, try not to lead her on
[02:29.53] Shawty's heart was on steroids
[02:31.15] 'Cause her love was so strong
[02:33.14] You may fall in love when you meet her (meet her)
[02:35.22] If you get the chance you better keep her (keep her)
[02:36.87] She's sweet as pie, but if you break her heart
[02:38.78] She'll turn cold as a freezer (freezer)
[02:40.61] That fairy tale ending with a knight in shining armor
[02:43.94] She can be my Sleeping Beauty
[02:45.90] I'm gon' put her in a coma (whoo!)
[02:48.17] Damn, I think I love her
[02:48.86] Shawty so bad, I'm sprung and I don't care
[02:51.17] She got me like a roller coaster
[02:52.17] Turn the bedroom into a fair (a fair)
[02:55.23] Her love is like a drug
[02:56.70] I was tryna hit it and quit it
[02:58.33] But lil' mama so dope
[02:59.90] I messed around and got addicted
[03:03.42] So you wanna play with magic?
[03:07.03] Boy, you should know what you falling for (you should know)
[03:10.64] Baby, do you dare to do this?
[03:14.34] 'Cause I'm coming at you like a dark horse (like a dark horse)
[03:18.31] Are you ready for, ready for (ready for)
[03:22.36] A perfect storm, a perfect storm? (A perfect storm)
[03:25.88] 'Cause once you're mine, once you're mine (mine)
[03:30.36] There's no going back
[03:31.39]
